reviewText: An excellent video. It brought back many happy and sad memories. I remember watching them play and the Miller Lite commercials. Of course Merlin was a part of the family with his television shows. I wiped away many a tear as they discussed the special friendships formed between these 4 special men.
A beautiful tribute to the wonderful lives of these four talented individuals. Truly moving.

I ENJOYED WATCHING THE DVD. NO COMPLAINTS.
THANK YOU,
ROGER
great true story of four football players who stayed close friends all the rest of there lives a story that every young football player should see

The NFL Network feature on the Rams' Fearsome Foursome - and nothing else. Contains no extra footage, bonus features, or extended length. Glad to have this in my collection, but NFL Network really did the bare minimum here.
If you were around for the "fearsome foursome" then this is the DVD for you!.  I loved every minute of it because I was there!
Arrived and packed in excellent condition
